function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Concentration of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in sewage water","Impact":"Risk of contamination of the water system and potential spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Standardized protocols for detection and quantification of wastewater samples","Technologies":"RT-qPCR assays, chlorine, UV radiation, ozone, chloramine for water treatment","People":"Population using the water system","Owner":"Health authorities, water treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Development of RT-qPCR assays for SARS-CoV-2 RNA detection in water","Impact":"Potential inaccuracies in detecting SARS-CoV-2 RNA in water samples","Mitigation":"Quality control measures for assay development","Technologies":"RT-qPCR assays","People":"Laboratory personnel","Owner":"Laboratories, research institutions"},{"Description":"Enveloped and non-enveloped pathogens in the water system","Impact":"Risk of contamination and potential spread of various pathogens","Mitigation":"Comprehensive water disinfection methods","Technologies":"Chlorine, UV radiation, ozone, chloramine for water treatment","People":"Population using the water system","Owner":"Water treatment facilities"}]}
